values:
i'm walking down the street on the sidewalk by myself, in a town i don't really recognize. it's getting dark outside and i start hating the fact i am by myself. i take my cell phone out of my purse and act like i am busy on my phone, pretending not to notice the man walking in my direction on the sidewalk. he stops me and asks for my phone. my reply didn't satisfy him as he reached his hand forward to grab either my phone or my purse, but i saw it coming and swung my arm out of his path. i scream. i turn around and start running in the opposite direction. i can hear his fast footsteps following close behind. i desperately look for any signs of an open store with a someone who can help me. finally i see a light on. he is still following me. i look into the large display window and see you standing there, reading a book. i scream your name. all you do is look up. and then he finally reaches me. he pries my phone from my hand and tries to pull my purse from my grip. i scream your name again begging for you to help me. all you do is look up and say you will be right there. i'm struggling with the man, fighting as hard as i can. i scream again. this time you don't look up. and the man runs off with my purse and i am standing there in front of you so vulnerable and hurt, and you can't even look at me in the face.

i think dreams are just bullshit really. i rarely ever remember them and they are usually just some stupid event, but this one i cant get out of my head. i keep going over it and over it in my head trying to decide if it actually means something or if it really is just a bunch of bullshit. i still get the chills when i think about it.

i can't wait for this semester to be done.
then like 3 weeks off then summer school!!! i love my life!!!!

i need to move out. for sure.
i want to punch you in the face when you say that bullshizzzz donna!

my life is sort of pissing me off. i keep crying all the time. over nothing really. like i will be watching tv and just start crying. i don't understand. my dad is sick. the doctors don't know what is wrong. he could have this shitty ass disease where your muscles slowly all stop working and you eventually lose the ability to use the muscles you need to breathe. freakin scary. i think i'm becoming addicted to gambling at the chumash. but it's weird because i don't care if i win or lose, and if i lose..which i almost always do it's only 20 bucks. but i feel like i go there for the social aspect of it, as lame as that sounds. you would be surprised at how many different people you can meet sitting at a table.madison turned 2 the other day. i've been getting really good grades in school lately. which would be cool if my parents cared. today i won kelly clarkson tickets off the radio. and in may i bought tickets to katy perry. something to look forward to. i've been called off 2 times at work at marian this week so i have had so many extra days off and i feel so guilty about it. and i don't know why i wrote this.

pretty excited to see katy perry.
wooooo!
i met jim adkins. dream come true.

i really, really want to go see britney spears on her new tour.
like really, really. let's go!
today madison decided to wake me up by giving me a big ol kiss. seriously, i almost cried....again. it was so freakin cute.

this is going to be a long semester. its only like week 2 but i'm getting close to being burt out with everything.

sometimes my job at marian is sooo draining. physically and emotionally. i see some pretty fucked up and sad things and it just makes you so pissed off at people. on top of being sooo busy. 

i want my hair done. with a cool color in it...but i can't decide. pink maybe? blue? i'm thinking purple.
so i just did my taxes and i'm getting back close to $5,000. it's totally awesome, but makes no sense because i only paid in about $1,000. but whatever...i'll take it!
this summer no doubt is going on tour. hell to the yeah.

can i please be in someone's band?

cooommeee on i'll play the tambourine!

I'm a "self-centered selfish girl".

ok? sorry that he thought i was more important.


not!

i pray that i won't end up like that. i will not live that life. i will not end up in a loveless marriage while my children resent me. i could not live that life. that will not be me. no way, now how. i refuse.
the older i get every year, the less and less it feels like christmas. it's like that feeling you're supposed to get died after you turn a certain age. such a bummer.
i finally got my raise at my job at Marian. i get payed 3 more bucks an hour. boo freakin ya!!!!!
not being able to fall asleep is the worst thing ever!

dude.


i HAVE to see Australia.

i am freakin bored out of my mind.


something cool please happen in my life. cause i'm getting desperate.

i always feel so guilty when i have a day off. like i'm wasting my day, like i don't deserve one. i feel pretty useless. which makes no sense. 

anyways, i feel like i'm starting all over again. gay.

<lj-embed id="1"/>.



so good. i'm in love.
just like limbeck says, people don't change.
well, things are going to suck for my family now.

i feel really good. i can't believe how far its come since what a month ago? i remember laying in my bed each night crying so hard i made myself throw up. that week was literally the worst. i had never been that sad in my life. i thought it would never go away. last night i went to death cab. i'm not that huge of a fan and didn't really expect it to be fun, but it seriously was awesome. they were really good, and your messages throughout the show made it even better. we are good. things are good. life is good. today at california fresh i made chad laugh. so that's an extra thousand points. i feel crazy right now. i just wanna dance

i just got back from my brothers football game. st. joes vs. pioneer. it was a pretty big game. crazy because my brother kevin plays on st. joes and my brother danny is the defensive coach for pioneer. anyways, it was really good. the babies loved it and actually watched it. theresa made these huge ass signs for both my brothers and we were screaming "I see you baby" every five minutes trying to get kevin to turn around. high school football games bring back so many memories. i don't know about you guys, but i freaking loved high school. CLASS '06 BABY!!!! 

i cut a couple inches of my hair off. so sad, but i had to. and i got new bangs.
love love love dance parties in my car with madison. we were jammin to alicia keys.
so. i guess i'm going to death cab. gonna pick up some gay indie dudes with emilee. haha!!!!

so my time is almost up. finally. for the past 10 1/2 hours i have been watching 2 1 1/2 years olds and a 10 month old. i am freakin exhausted. i am in desperate need of a shower. i want to do something tonight. but you won't call. like usual. you frustrate me so much.

today two girls from ca fresh that i kind of used to know im high school came into cal fresh when theresa and i were working. and they were talking "oh i just transferred to cal poly" and "statistics is kicking my butt" and blah blah. made me feel so stupid. i should be in my third year of college already. well i am but it's like my first. if i didn't fuck up i would be graduating in like a year and a half. freaking gay.

finally feeling okay with the whole thing. no more crying or regretting. it's all good.


okay well sort of. i'm getting there.

"It's been a bad day,
another bad day and I cross my heart and hope to die
these dreams of yours are 'gonna fly."

obsessed with this song. story of my life.

[07 Jan 2004|01:16am]
[	mood	|	 excited	]
oh my fucking god! guess who emailed me today??!!!
none other than eric james from shop 11 phoenix....i amlost pissed my pants.
i cant beleive it.

it might sound really lame to some people....but it just made my week.

i still cant beleive it.

oh man is that boy hottttt.....extra t's for extra hottness.

3 comments|post comment



urrent mood:	 sick
Current music:	bright eyes
i think i am sick...and it sucks. yesterday was fun. i hung out with lindsay and theresa. we went out to eat at this pizza place and on the way home we stopped at spencers. okay so there usually are these two really hot guys working there and i got bummed out because when we went inside i didnt see them. so i said "man one of them is usually working." and as i turned down another grocery isle one was the guys was standing right there. so lindsay decided to say, "hey melissa one of them is working." it was soo funny...but a little imbarrasing.then we went back to lindsays house were she tried to glue her boobs together. didnt work out to great.



i'm bored and was looking at my old livejournal. 
god i was so much cooler when i was 15.

this is the worst. i feel like i have already failed on madison. this isn't how it's suppost to be. i fucked up and she is paying the consequences. she is never going to have a "real" family. her dad will live somewhere else and she most likely will not get to see him on a regular basis like she should. she never even got a chance. so not fair and so fucked up. i just feel so bad that her family life is going to be hard. i keep having really shitty days going over it and over it in my head. i don't think i will ever forgive myself for doing this to her. i hope she doesn't hate me for it when she gets older. 

i'm trying. i'm killing myself in the process. why do i feel so alone and helpless? i feel so unappreciated..but what the hell do i do? the other day i just broke down with this overwhelming feeling of like oh shit i am repsonsible for her and everything she does or needs. how the hell am i going to do this? i'm tired. so tired of everything. i'm crumbling. my whole life i have constantly always had a smile on my face and built myself up as some great person.none of what am i writing makes sense. i feel so stupid trying to get attention. 

when am i going to be okay with my life and where i'm going. its never going to stop. have too many things in my head and they all lead my feeling hopeless. fuck my life. fuck myself. good job melissa.
i will always care. even through all the bullshit. i can't help it.

i love my baby. 

a nurse i work with offered me the nicest thing ever. she made my day. people like her make the world better. 

i invented a smoothie at cal fresh. offical status right here.

my tattoo itches. crusty!

now i will always be a princess. 
aww i love my friends. linday and theresa, thank you so much for everything you do for me. you make me smile. you make me laugh.you make me feel loved. i love you guys. what was a horrible day turned out better than i expected.

i just keep on breaking down.

i bought madison a pirate costume for halloween. pretty cute.

i think i'm going to get a tattoo. with emilee. 

then again, i change my mind a lot. there is a good chance i will chicken out.
i had such a good dream last night. i woke up smiling. and i still do when i think about it. too bad it's not real!!!! lameo

i can't sleep cause i'm too excited. except, i'm not excited for anything?? i'm getting that same feeling like you get the night before you go to disneyland and you can't wait for it to be morning. and i can't stop thinking. what the eeff???

california fresh rules. emilee works there now...so basically my 3 best, and really only, friends all work there. 


also, i am in need of around $60,000. i'm currently collecting any donations. its my melissaneedstomoveawayandgotocollege fund.

i have come to the conclusion that i am not settling for becoming a nurse at hancock. i need my bachelor's degree. for sure. so in two years i plan on moving away to one of the colleges i have in mind after i get my aa. this will rule for many reasons. i pray that all this works out. i just have to bust some work out these next couple years then i'm set for the rest of my life.
i need to learn patience. and learn the difference between needing and wanting. i need to learn to be happy with myself, by myself.

today i spent about 3 hours all by myself.
and let me tell you, it was amazing. 
no baby, no friends, no family.

oh the little things in life i took for granted.
